TopicTitle: A mod to keep an historic of launch and mission ?

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

 

I'm looking for a mod who keep track of all my launches results, to improve RP. Actually after each launch I keep a trace manually on an external spreadsheet but if a kind of mod like this exist it would save some times.  I make some search, but the problem is every search send me to the "making history" DLC ... perhaps I've not the good words in english to find what I want, perhaps it's just a dream ...

what I want is something like Final Frontier but for launches and missions. Something who keep the date of launch,  name of the vessel, milestone records, contract done,  some stats (top speed, altitude), safe landing or crash, biome and location, Kerbal in the mission, ...

 

hope make life and push forward the limits
Closest out there at the moment is Space Age by Garwel

Thanks you save my life !

I go to try this mod directly, it's not exactly what I'm reporting in my spreadsheet but looks like more complete on some points and time saver anyway.
